Package nl.han.ica.oopg.objects

Class SpriteObject

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.GameObject
nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.SpriteObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IKeyInput, IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alien, AnimatedSpriteObject, Fighter
public abstract class SpriteObject
extends GameObject
The SpriteObject is a extension of GameObject. Instead of having a draw implementation you will need to provide an image/sprite.
